dct_title_s: Ægyptus Hodierna : ex itinerario celeberrimi viri, Pauli Lucæ Franci desumpta, ac novissime
dct_description_sm: repræsentata à Johanne Baptista Homann = das heutige Ægypten : aus der Reyssbeischreiburg des berühmten H.n Paul Lucas / gezogē, und mit folgenden Denkwurdigkeiten herausgegeben von Iohann Bapt. Homann ; Scale 1:2,300,000 ; Relief shown by hachures ; 'Joannes Christophorus I.B. Homanni filius delineavit. Cum privilegio sac. cæs. majestatis.' ; Includes illustrations of Cataracts of the Nile, the Pyramids, tombs, various antiquities, scenes of embalming, and ancient furnaces. ; Place names in Latin and German ; Norimbergæ : J.B. Homann
dct_rights_sm: The images on this web site, from maps in the collection of the Melville J. Herskovits Library of African Studies and housed in the Government & Geographic Information Collection of Northwestern University Libraries are in the public domain in the United States, and as such, not subject to copyright restriction. The Libraries request users cite both the URL and Northwestern University Libraries if they wish to reproduce images from the repository. For access to higher resolution images please contact repository@northwestern.edu
